file_content.text:
Feero has outlined the parameters for a high-priority mission in the Camp Traken-4 sector of Balmorra. For additional details about the mission, Feero may be contacted in-person. Otherwise, the mission may be initiated from this terminal for your convenience.
This mission may require a small group. It may be completed once per week.

Agent Protarius has outlined the parameters for a high-priority mission in the Sobrik sector of Balmorra. For additional details about the mission, Agent Protarius may be contacted in-person. Otherwise, the mission may be initiated from this terminal for your convenience.
This mission may require a small group. It may be completed once per week.
